```{r}
repeats = 1000
sample_size = 20
effect_size = 2
limit = 0.05

true_positives = 0
for(i in 1:repeats){

  treated_data = sample(1:20,20, replace = TRUE) + effect_size
  control_data = sample(1:20,20, replace = TRUE)

  pval <- t.test(treated_data,control_data)$p.value
  if (pval < limit){
    true_positives = true_positives + 1
    }
}
print(true_positives/repeats)
```
